description: Tyler was asked what he wanted to do and who with, and he immediately said he needed to feed fellow jock boy Koby his big cock. Koby wouldn't have said no to that, but he probably didn't expect to be roped down to the platform and stretched out like this, hot molten wax being dripped painfully all over his naked body and dick, while being fed that gorgeous meaty cock. It's uncomfortable, and you can tell Koby is trying not to cry out and show how much pain he's in, but he still wants that cock and cum load from his handsome master Tyler!
title: Koby Lewis & Tyler Underwood
